text: Akuyi kubakho sono kuni, ukuba nithe nahlukana nabafazi benu ningekabachukumisi (ngokwesondo) ningekalibeki ixabiso lemahr. Kodwa ke banikeni (izipho eziyimfanelo), osisityebi ngokwendlela emfaneleyo, olihlwempu ngokwendlela emfaneleyo. Isipho sexabiso lemvisiswano siluxanduva lwabenzi bokulungileyo
